content: As part of a 2-day FHIR overview training course I'd like to include a 15-minute overview of cds-hooks (near the end of the course, as an example use case). Any pointers as to where I might find a PPT presentation that can be tweked to fit that purpose ? -- Thanks.

René - I've got slides that we are using for our AMIA presentation next week. I can email you the slides now or if you wait until next week (Mon 14th) the final slides will be public and I can send you a link
Actually, I can just upload my slides to my Github account now...just a sec
Here you go @René Spronk - https://github.com/kpshek/amia-2016
@(null) Kevin - thanks, just the kind of thing that was needed..
Sharing slides via Github, awesome – Kevin, I'd also like to use some of your slides and weave them into a FHIR overview course if that is okay.
@Pascal Pfiffner - That's fine. Have at it!
